ModMetaData.name: Warhammer 40.000: Imperium Apparel
ModMetaData.author: flangopink, Ogam
ModMetaData.description: Warhammer 40.000 - is a collaboration project between many artists and coders to bring vanilla taste to the blood of Warhammer world. Motto of this project is: "Vanilla art, vanilla balance, fuck the VOID".\n\nThe Imperium Apparel module adds various armour and clothing from the Warhammer 40k universe.
